content.question: An asteroid orbits the Sun in a highly elliptical orbit. As the asteroid gets closer to the Sun, how are the total mechanical energy and the gravitational potential energy of the asteroid-Sun system changing, if at all?

choices.label: Total Mechanical EnergyGravitational Potential EnergyNot changingNot changing
Total Mechanical Energy Gravitational Potential EnergyNot changingDecreasing
Total Mechanical Energy Gravitational Potential EnergyIncreasingNot changing
Total Mechanical Energy Gravitational Potential EnergyIncreasingDecreasing

content.answer: Total Mechanical Energy Gravitational Potential EnergyNot changingDecreasing
